reviews.review: muito bom

I really like the concept of this game.  The storyline is solid and the 4v1 realistic.  The additional content packs are good as well.  

They have recently changed their content system and added in a "store" feature with TONS of cosmetics.  Some you can only buy with real currency, but many can be acquired through in-game play.

In general I really enjoy the game.  It's challenging at times, frustrating at times, and genuinely terrifying often.  It's also a very new interesting way to game.  This is the first time I have seen assymetrical gameplay done this way.

If you are on the fence about the game go check out the twitch.tv streamers play.  Easily worth the $10 sale price.
入坑steam的第一款游戏，在直播中看到的，很感兴趣。果然也没让我失望，游戏的娱乐性（竞技性）很强。在这个游戏里真的很能体验到不同队友的人情冷暖。能遇见拼命救你的superhero，也能遇到弃你于不顾的“二五仔”。不过游戏就是游戏，无论怎么死亡轮回，我们都是农场里欢快的偷电贼，说笑一年，愤怒一年，感动一年，回忆一年。大力推荐，值得一试。

The game does some things well and other things it decides don't matter. If a killer is carrying someone and drops 15 feet it doesn't effect the wiggling, so I challange any of the devs to carry someone and drop 15 feet down the stairs into a basement and hold on to them, record that and go ahead and send it to me. Also I'd love to know who decided that if you're being chased by a 350 pound 6 ft 10 man that you even while sprinting wouldn't just full speed vault over cover? Nah I'm gonna slowly saunter over this so he can get me. I just wish that the devs would maybe use a tad bit of common sense when "balancing" This game has potential but if you're expecting a perfect game of hide and seek, expect to be seen through walls. 

Also there's a bug in the game where if the eula pops up again after the first one you lose all progress. That's a fun bug.

Ahora que llevo más horas puedo decir:

Si eres un jugador común y corriente como yo, que no le dedica mil horas al juego para ser un "pro", sentirás que el juego tiene mucho a favor de los asesinos, es bastante complejo sobre todo si juegas con desconocidos porque muchos juegan para salvarse sólos, no juegan en equipo, así que mantengo mi idea de que esto se disfruta con amigos de forma más organizada.

=======================================================================

Un juego con varios pro y contra pero lo resumiré de la siguiente forma desde mi perspectiva:

- El juego lo jugamos siempre en grupo de amigos, todos siempre como sobrevivientes, me parece que es la forma ideal para disfrutar el juego.

- Están bastante desbalanceados los asesinos, cuando aparece uno que juega relativamente es muy dificil escapar, por lo que el trabajo en equipo es fundamental, dicho esto, si juegan sólos como sobrvivientes con gente desconocida, será dificil escapar si no hay comunicación o si cada uno anda por su lado.

- Quizá no supimos como, pero después de armar una party y terminar de jugar una partida, se disuelve y hay que volver a invitar a todos, es un poco molesto que no esté esa opción, a no ser que no la hayamos visto.

- La conexión por momentos es bastante inestable, muchas veces armas la party y cuando todos ponen ready, se cancela y hay que volver a armar todo, y durante la partida pueden haber momentos de harto lag que te pueden echar a perder todo (como no poder ayudar a un compañero colgado porque el lag no te deja).

- El modo de ir subiendo de nivel e ir comprando los perks, items y add-ons está bastante entretenido, todos los personajes tienen sus habilidades únicas por lo que los hace interesante ir probandolos todos, asi como los asesinos.

- Los modos de juegos son los justos y necesarios, jugar como sobreviviente o como asesino, y luego los modos coop que son sobrevivir con amigos y matar a los amigos.

- ¿No hay opción para ajustar el brillo del juego?

En general este juego lo recomiendo si tienen amigos con quien jugarlo, sólo me imagino que no debe ser lo mismo.
不错 挺好玩的

สนุกมากๆๆ

Let me be upfront first. This game is very fun and keeps you on edge. It's fun to play the many different survivors and killers and experiment with their perks and addons during the game. Now I'm by no means and expert at the game but I can say it is worth buying. However I cannot give it a recommendation for one reason. The game focuses on the killer capturing the survivors and placing them on hooks to sacrifice the survivors to an creature called the Entity. This is a cool concept as you have a limited number of times you can be hooked (Or how long you can be on the hook) before you are emanated. The problem with this is in a 4v1 game this is taken advantage of by killers who camp survivors. Because survivors can get each other off the hooks easily they find it easier to simply camp and bait than to use their killers perks and a bit of skill to find survivors. 

Depending on the level of camping it makes it very difficult to near impossible to save your fellow players and results in the killer having an unfair advantage even with perks like Barowed Time (Which allows you to take an extra hit of damage before going down after a short period). I tend to see a lot of this in my games and in games on youtube and it's a very serious problem and needs to be addressed by the Devs now. They fixed all of the other issues that put killers at a disadvantage so how hard is it to program a system to punish a killer for camping? And I'm not alone in this matter as other fair players have pointed out these flaws. Worst the community has become quite bad to interact with because if players aren't looking out for themselves in the game then in the after game chat things can get quite heated and toxic.

I have not experienced the dreaded progress wipe bug I see everyone talking about but I do have some issue with losing my progress. Especially if this bug has been around since the game launched and hasn't been fixed yet with over a year of time after launch. Also issues with lag, losing rank when your internet crashes (Even though you didn't quit) and glitches in the system are among several other mounting issues.

RING RING RING said in his review quote: “ Don't buy., or if you do, only do so for fun, not to actually play "competitively" " and I whole heartily agree with him. To be fair I intend to keep playing the game but I'm not supporting it any further than I already have.



Also a message to the developers if your reading this. I love playing this game, but I've seen and read about so many problems the game has that have not been fixed or addressed. Some of which I have experienced first and often. The rest such as the progress loss and your bad customer support center I hope I never have to experience as that would be a full deal breaker for me. I had planed to buy all of the DLC but until the game sees some improvement I'll not sink any more of my money, not one more cent, into the game until at least some of these issues are fixed.

Great game, unfortunately it is way unbalanced atm.
Survivors have way to high advantage:  third person view, turning on a dime(juking), nonstop pallet / window vaulting, can instantly unhook someone.
The juking and third person do not bother me as much as the pallet/window vaulters and the instant unhooking of someone.
There needs to be a stamina, timer, bar/cooldown to both the vaulting and unhooking.

Honestly the devs are complete garbage and haven't listened for years when it comes to this game and I think the community as a whole is over it. Other then that its a fun game to play with friends and can become very addicting.

回線やデータに異常がなく、チートも使ってない筈なのにEACに引っかかってペナルティを食らった。
流石にバカバカしい。
操作ミスで退出をしていまいペナルティを喰らった。退出ボタン必要なのだろうか、どんな理由であったとしてもペナルティを与えるのなら退出ボタンは必要ないと思われる。
この運営は意見の多い方に流されて調節するので、ゲームの検証を怠っている。
バグも多く、試合が勝手に落ちて、参加している人間が全員ペナルティを食らうバグもある。
ゲーム自体は楽しめるが、バグがシーズン、アプデごとに増えていっている。
真面目な話これから買うのはお勧めできない。バグが増えていくので後期に買うだけ損である。

One of the most amazing games I've played in a long time.  I thought at first that it was too simple and repetetive but I've played it so much already and I am completely loving every minute.  It's a simple game to understand and to play but it has surprising complexity.  Totally recommend this to anyone who loves being scared, survival games, is a horror enthusiast, or just wants a fun game to play that actually has a really fantastic community.  Oh, that's one more thing, as someone who mostly plays survivor I have to say I've had some really fun interactions with the people who have played the killer in my games.  I have not had a game that didn't end cordially and I just can't even say a negative thing.  Oh, well now that I said that I can think of one thing:  the servers are very laggy sometimes for me.  Laggy enough that it sometimes makes a match unplayable.  It's not super frequent or anything but the game could be greatly improved by addressing this - though I'm sure it's a question of resources.
Is glitchy, and areas that you can easy walkthrough get you block.

The Entity is pleased... Dead by daylight is a 1 vs 4, killer vs survivors multiplayer only game.  It does a good job of balancing the 2 sides at low level ranked play.  The music is good and the atmosphere is creepy.  If halloween is close by I'd recommend playing.  There are quite a few killers with unique perks, the survivors however are mostly similiar.  Tension is what this game does best, mostly from the survivor side.  Turning around while working on a generator to see Michael Myers staring at you is as creepy as it gets.  Pick it up on sale.

恶性bug太恶心了！！！

你见过开门以后挑逗屠夫半天，随后跑出门，然后游戏没有结束，还能继续跑，跑出了边界，然后从边界掉下去坠入虚空，再然后突然回到到屠夫身边的bug吗？我碰到了！！！然后被屠夫好一顿嘲笑，抱了摔、摔了抱，然后围着我绕圈圈，然后把我挂上钩子在旁边翻柜子，再然后尬舞。我也只能挣扎挣扎跟他尬。尬你妹啊！

对了，不光这一件事，还有下面这一件事：

祭祀奖励中有两项，一项是用杨教授处决一个玩家奖励6万血点。我就问你我花了那么多血点，从0级一直点到27级，好不容易点出一个红处决的来，带上以后遇到一队人皇，再好不容易砍倒了一个，然后bug了，无法使用处决。对着躺在地上被3级电疗的人皇玩家各种角度各种朝向来试图激活那个处决祭祀奖励，可就是无法使用，我的内心是有多么的崩溃！这我能干吗，我又浪费了好多好多血点，点到30级，好不容易又点出一个红处决，心里美滋滋，然后我就想：这么不容易点出来的，那就先完成另一个简单一点的祭祀，然后认真地用掉这个红处，赢得那个祭祀奖励。哦对了，另外一项祭祀是用电锯屠夫挂9个人奖励13万血点，作为一个相对小萌新，辛辛苦苦的跟人皇队伍互肛到完成了7/9。可就在刚刚，突然服务器显示断开，然后服务器重新连接，并出现一段对话框说：段位重置，然后所有祭祀都没有了，都没有了，没有了，了……。我踏马废了那么多血点，点出来的红处是干什么用的，干什么用的！！！！！！！！！你踏马的赔我血点赔我血点我的血点我辛辛苦苦赚回来的血点被人皇溜到死照瞎眼只能靠踩板踩电机拉空锯才辛辛苦苦攒出来的血点，啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！



写完这篇评论又进入游戏看了看，我的天，原来不光祭祀奖励被重置了，所有东西包括经验、物品、血点都没有了，统统没有了，没有了，了。

这差评实至名归！

Game is loads of fun... when played as it was originally designed to be played.  The only reason this gets a negative is because of the ridiculously skewed balance issues and gamebreaking SWF + VOIP.

[u]Playing as Killer[/u]
Thanks to SWF (Survive with Friends), games quickly become lessons in futility when you are matched against them.
[list]
[*] There is no clear way to see when you are against SWF.  You can assume if 2+ pop up simultaneously, but confirming is a time consuming and tedious task because you have to look up every single players profile to confirm they are together (if their profiles are not private).
[*] Using outside VOIP, they're easily able to communicate where you are at all times and coordinate positioning anywhere on the map.
[*] Able to coordinate perks/addons/offerings to completely screw the killer.  I personally had a game where a confirmed SWF walked in where every single survivor had a yellow [b]Toolbox + addons[/b], all had [b]Saboteur + Borrowed Time + Sprint Burst + Self Care[/b] perks, and all used [b]Petrified Oak[/b] offerings (-1 hook on map).  It was quite clear what their strategy was.  Even with hooks respawning after 3 minutes, they were still pretty much assured the win thanks to VOIP comms.
[*] Flashlights are a constant issue in the hands of good survivors.  A single survivor can stall you out repeatedly with a Yellow+ grade when you try to do just about anything.  Want to break that pallet?  Get stunned by flashlight.  Go around the wall?  Get stunned coming around corner.  Wanna hang that survivor?  Buddy runs ahead and body blocks hook and stuns.  Follow through a window?  Nope, stunned as soon as animation ends.  Personally, I find it to be the most "overpowered" item when used correctly.
[*] Hexs are pretty much only useful against "newbie" survivors who ignore totems.  Otherwise, kiss your hexes goodbye in the first minute.
[*] Pallet loops.  Enough said.
[*] Hatch escapes.  Unless you camp the hatch, it's 100% escape for a survivor.  And if you do, smart survivors will go and finish generators.  It's my opinion that if you are a good survivor, escape becomes EASIER when you are last one standing.
[*] "Teabagging" at exits can get tiresome, especially when survivors go out of their way to do it.  10x worse when it's SWF do it as a group because clearly they had "superior skill" over you with their VOIP and preconstructed strats.  Try not to let it get to you too much.
[/list]

If you want to avoid a bad experience as killer, dodge every SWF you come across because it's just not worth the hassle.  Playing against 4 randoms (again, as the game was originally intended) will lead to far more fun games for you.

[u]Playing as Survivor[/u]
Starting out, expect to die.  A LOT.  A lot of killers lower their ranks purposely to "farm easy BP" with their fully decked T3 perks and purple addons/offerings against newbie survivors.  Other killers are actually pretty decent, but are low because of SWF matches.  However, once you start collecting your "best" perk combos (such as [b]Decisive Strike + Borrowed Time + Sprint Burst + Premonition[/b]) and some practice in, escaping becomes EZMODE against just about any killer.  Until that point, however, each killer has their own annoyance to deal with.

[u]Trapper[/u]
If you're not paying attention, it's easy to miss the traps on the ground, especially in tall grass.  However, if you happen to have the perk, these get highlighted for you so you never have to step on one again. But that requires a bit of luck of you having the perk equipped and get a Trapper for a killer.

[u]Wraith[/u]
Currently the worst killer.  Thanks to the perk [b]Premonition[/b], this guy is completely negated.  You shouldn't come across him too often.

[u]Hillbilly[/u]
As long as you don't run in a straight line while he chainsaw charges, he's easily avoidable.  Stay out of sight until he charges away, then do generators.  He's supposedly "one of the best", but I just don't see it.  Then again I am terrible playing him as killer.

[u]Nurse[/u]
Not even an argument, currently "one of the best".  A good nurse is a nightmare to play against thanks to her blink.  Want to escape through that window?  Blinks to the other side.  Want to pallet loop?  Think again!  That combined with the ability to patrol generators quickly can make her quite difficult to escape from.

[u]Shape[/u]
Myers' Evil Within is a good/bad mechanic, all dependent on survivor gameplay.  Be vigilant of your surrounds to make sure he's not staring at you.  Once he hits EW3, avoid him at all costs.  Overall, he is far too dependent on being close range to be effective, so if you're good at running around and pallet looping, this guy is an easy win.

[u]Hag[/u]
Grossly underestimated killer and my current highest winrate.  Good Hags will [b]NOT[/b] place traps near objectives, but instead in pinch points and escape routes to prohibit long chases.  Traps can be negated by flashlights, but you'd have to be actively searching for them, which wastes charges, and you're just better off saving that for the stun saves.  Escape and rescues are difficult against a good Hag (be sure to ready up your "GG CAMPER!!!" in post game chat) who plans ahead.

[u]Doctor[/u]
Really a "hit or miss" killer, by that I mean he's either going to completely stomp the survivors or be lucky to even kill one of them.  The Madness is an inconvience at best when you get used to it.  The hallucinations are static so they're easily ignored.  Madness tier changes give off your location because of your scream, just make sure to move somewhere else. 
 However, if the Doc is using some high tier addons, generators become a real pain in the ass to complete.  Intelligent play makes his entire kit underwhelming.

[u]Huntress[/u]
Her song/terror radius is astronomically huge, which is a benefit for survivors to which you can hear her coming a mile away.  However, practiced Huntress players can take down survivors easily with hit + axe throw.  If you are dependent on hiding in cabinets, kiss that strat goodbye since those are where she restocks axes.  Newbie Huntress players are easy wins as long as you remember to not run in straight lines.

[u]Cannibal[/u]
Most current and controversial as far as if he's "OP" or not.  He has the benefit of full control of his one-shot chainsaw in close range, but lacks the ability to cover the entire map effectively.  Hook rushing is completely negated with his chainsaw being able to one-shot multiple survivors at once.  His perks are a bit on the ridiculous side, especially Barbecue and Chili.  IMO, it's really his perks that really put him over the edge and breaks the game against survivors who do not have the perks to counter his equipped.

[u]Summary[/u]
When I tried the game years before, it was heavily in the killer's favor.  Now, with the potential perk combinations that can competely screw killers before the game even starts, it's clearly tilted the other way.  Throw in SWF and it completely breaks the balance of the game in favor of survivors.

If you're a survivor main, have skills above a potato, and have friends with VOIP, congrats on your EZ wins.
If you're a killer main, dodge every SWF group you get until you get a randomized survivor group as the game was designed for and enjoy a "fairer" match.

게임을 할때마다 옛날 숨바꼭질 하던때의 설레임이 느껴진다...물론 처음엔 공포지만...

Игра где вы с друзьями бегаете от "Башмака" (самый сильный маньяк в игре). 99 Процентов играют только на нём, потому что очень сильный. Шансы что вы от него убежите практически равны 0, но возможно, он захочет вспомнить детство как он с отцом ездил в тир и стрелял, и начнёт просто стрелять по вам, не убивая. Так же советую дочитать историю про него в самой игре до конца, думаю вас должен был заинтересовать тот фрагмент её, который я процитировал.

Все совпадения персонажи, а вымышленное случайно.
рекамендую очень интересная игра
gg wp

Наигра 400+ часов пришло мое время писать обзор .
За это время появилось 4 сурва и маньяка , у всех перки весьма полезны , для разных стилей игры .
Лично мне из манов понравился Майкл (но его 2 перка противоположны 1 ) и Медсестра (ну на ней я брал из ее перков зов ибо не привычно играть с остальными ибо пытаюсь сразу убить сурвов ) 
А по выжившим то Джейк Парк (т.к. первые часы на нем были) и Лори Строуд (со временем научился играть со осколком , ну и хорошие перки выпали )
Из плюсов то
1.Хороший саундтрек
2.Хороший лор игры
3.Можно по фану взять билд с раскрытий аур мана и себя и бегать и злить его 
4.Порой фанясь можно затащить катку 
Из минусов то:
1.Порой к тебя может закинуть китайца который будет бегать быстрее тебя
2.Баги (но их фиксят , но все же встречаю раз в 5 каток)
3.После обновление один из манов у меня лагает не знаю с чем это связоно но все же
P.S. Остерегайтесь сурва с крушителем , а не то в важный момент для вас он вас как СЛОМАЕТ КРЮК и вы потеряете сурва с плеча . У меня все
